channel.title: Could any 1 create a Curse'r
channel.description:
Could any 1 create a Curse'r wich curses in varrok castle on the wizard
Great thanks any 1 who dose it

item.title: Could any 1 create a Curse'r
item.dc:creator: @dead_link dead_link
item.description:
@dead_link wrote:

u know one cud be made
and i got a faster way to make it happen
when u curse, u get 29 xp whether u miss or ur spell is successful
so wear equipment that is bound to make u miss
wear say full rune with kite and scim and str/def ammy ( any ammy that doesnt give bonus in mage )
if member wear granite shield
that way u are sure to miss

and the script will keep on “casting” the spell while u get xp super fast
this is the best way to get mage xp through curses
cheap and fast
though u will have to buy water and earths and cant use a staff coz it gives mage bonus

Read full topic

You have to click there -.-

item.title: Could any 1 create a Curse'r
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

well u should be able to use a regular auto fighter and just set the colors in yourself. just manually pick the color of the wizard and put it in where it should go and have the runes and stuff with you and it should attack the wizard;)
